result.title: Rethinking computing seminar & Report
result.description: Rethinking computing seminar This one-week seminar will confront historical and mathematical computing foundations with today’s AI and statistics paradigms and one seminar on historical foundation of today’s AI and statistical paradigms.After the seminar a report on the discussed topics will be published.
